Juicy Fest 2025: Montell Jordan, Ray J and Next added to line uphttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/juicy-fest-2025-montell-jordan-ray-j-and-next-add-to-line-up/IIPTDAP24BBBDBQS3XF5CLCAMU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/juicy-fest-2025-montell-jordan-ray-j-and-next-add-to-line-up/IIPTDAP24BBBDBQS3XF5CLCAMU/ Juicy Fest is a one-day festival, scheduled for four NZ shows. Kaitāia Airport’s future secured with iwi and council agreement https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northland-age/news/kaitaia-airports-future-secured-with-iwi-and-council-agreement/7DFGMDIEFNETJGPTBAUEQOLRIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northland-age/news/kaitaia-airports-future-secured-with-iwi-and-council-agreement/7DFGMDIEFNETJGPTBAUEQOLRIU/ Kaitāia Airport secured for NgāiTakoto with a long-term lease and $5.4m upgrade contract. Fri, 13 Dec 2024 01:00:00 +0000 NgāiTakoto confirmed they will purchase Kaitāia Airport in line with their Treaty settlement provisions, following a ceremony marking the entering of a long-term lease for Kaitāia Airport.

First of Te Rauā affordable rental homes to be unveiled in Wairoa on Monday https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/first-of-te-raua-affordable-rental-homes-to-be-unveiled-in-wairoa-on-monday/SR52WG2MCRDI5M4CPZL22CVMMY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/first-of-te-raua-affordable-rental-homes-to-be-unveiled-in-wairoa-on-monday/SR52WG2MCRDI5M4CPZL22CVMMY/ Te Rauā features 30 larger whānau homes and 13-bedroom supported living complex Fri, 13 Dec 2024 00:00:53 +0000 The first of 43 affordable houses being built on a Kitchener Street site in Wairoa will be officially blessed and unveiled on Monday.
